predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will close at or above $80,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if Yahoo Finance BTC-USD Adjusted Close on any UTC date through 2025-10-31 is >= 80000.00.
monitoring_signals: Spot bitcoin ETF net inflows/outflows (e.g., IBIT, FBTC)
Perpetual futures funding rates and basis
On-chain exchange balances and miner flows
predictions.rationale: Momentum, ETF inflows, and broader risk appetite increase odds of a breakout, with high volatility risk.

predictions.text: The Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) will close at or above 20.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if ^VIX official close (Cboe/Yahoo Finance) is >= 20.00 on any trading day through 2025-10-31 UTC.
monitoring_signals: S&P 500 skew and term structure (VIX futures contango/backwardation)
Macro event calendar (CPI, jobs, FOMC speakers)
Equity market breadth and gap risk
Treasury yield swings and credit spreads
predictions.rationale: Crowded bullish positioning and policy/geopolitical risks raise odds of a volatility spike.

predictions.text: AAA California average regular gasoline price will print at or above $5.80 per gallon on at least one day by 2025-10-20.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the AAA Gas Prices California state average for regular unleaded at gasprices.aaa.com reaches or exceeds $5.80 on any date through 2025-10-20 (local date).
monitoring_signals: CARBOB spot and rack prices (Los Angeles/SF)
PADD 5 refinery utilization and outage reports
predictions.rationale: A major refinery outage during maintenance season tightens PADD 5 supply, boosting retail prices.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, OFAC will announce an Iran-related sanctions action adding at least 10 new entries to the SDN List.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the U.S. Treasury publishes an Iran-related OFAC action by 2025-10-31 that nets >=10 new SDN entries in that action, per the official press release/SDN update.
monitoring_signals: Treasury press releases and SDN XML change logs
Congressional and White House statements on Iran
Regional escalation indicators in the Middle East
Maritime seizure or oil shipment enforcement activity
predictions.rationale: Continued enforcement and regional tensions make additional Iran designations likely in October.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-03 close to 2025-10-31 close, Invesco QQQ (QQQ) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Yahoo Finance adjusted closes for QQQ and SPY. Compute percent change from 2025-10-03 close to 2025-10-31 close. Success if (QQQ_change − SPY_change) >= 2.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: Rates duration sensitivity (real yields vs tech)
Options flow and call skew in QQQ/mega caps
predictions.rationale: AI leadership and duration sensitivity favor mega-cap growth versus the broader market into month-end.

predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing PMI (headline) for October 2025 will print between 48.0 and 50.5 in ISM’s release due by 2025-11-04.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the ISM Manufacturing PMI headline index for October 2025 is within [48.0, 50.5], per the Institute for Supply Management’s official release.
monitoring_signals: Regional Fed manufacturing surveys (Empire, Philly, Richmond, Dallas)
predictions.rationale: Manufacturing remains soft but stabilizing; inventory and new orders imply a range near the contraction/expansion threshold.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 3.95% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if FRED series DGS10 shows a daily close <= 3.95% on any date through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Term premium estimates and auction results
predictions.rationale: Potential growth/inflation downside and risk-off episodes can pull 10-year yields below 4% at least briefly.

predictions.text: Microsoft (MSFT) Q1 FY2026 total revenue will be between $60.0B and $63.5B, per the company’s earnings release published by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if Microsoft’s official earnings press release or Form 10-Q shows GAAP total revenue within [$60.0B, $63.5B] for fiscal Q1 2026.
monitoring_signals: Azure growth rate and AI workload demand
Copilot adoption metrics and attach rates
PC shipment trends affecting Windows OEM
predictions.rationale: Enterprise AI adoption and resilient cloud demand support mid-to-high single-digit revenue growth.

predictions.text: NYMEX RBOB gasoline front-month futures (RB) will settle at or above $2.60 per gallon on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if CME Group official settlement for the RB front-month contract is >= $2.6000/gal on any trading day through 2025-10-31.
monitoring_signals: Refinery outages and utilization rates (especially PADD 5)
CARBOB basis and West Coast spreads
predictions.rationale: Refinery disruptions and steady demand can push RB higher despite seasonal shoulder period.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-03 close to 2025-11-30 close, AMD (AMD) will outperform NVIDIA (NVDA) by at least 5.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Yahoo Finance adjusted closes for AMD and NVDA. Compute percent change from 2025-10-03 close to 2025-11-30 close. Success if (AMD_change − NVDA_change) >= 5.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: Supply chain lead times and allocations
predictions.rationale: Rotation toward challengers and product cadence can support AMD relative strength versus a crowded NVDA trade.

predictions.text: U.S. Retail Sales ‘control group’ (advance, MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between -0.3% and +0.2% in the Census release due 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Success if the Census ‘Advance Monthly Retail and Food Services’ report shows the control group (retail sales excluding motor vehicles & parts, gasoline stations, building materials, and food services) MoM SA change within [-0.3%, +0.2%] for Oct 2025.
monitoring_signals: Back-to-school and early holiday sales commentary
Real wage growth and labor market prints
Gasoline prices’ effect on real goods spending
predictions.rationale: Consumer momentum cools as student loan headwinds and goods disinflation tamp down control group growth.
